com.att.m2x.android.model

Class Distribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.m2x.android.model.Distribution

  • public class Distribution
extends java.lang.Object
    The Distribution API allows you to manage device distributions, allowing you to take a device from prototype to market. Distributions represent a group of Devices that begin life with the attributes of the original device template when created.

    Authentication: All methods described in this page require that a Master API Key is specified in the X-M2X-KEY header. Any attempt of using a Distribution or Device level API key would result in a 403 Forbidden response. Learn more about API Keys.
